item.title: How to remove white spaces in Java?
item.description: Removing white spaces in Java is simple. All we have to do is to use Regex and replaceAll() method of String class. A small tutorial is given below.

item.title: How to use Regular Expressions in Java – String Class Tutorial
item.description:
We can use Regular Expressions on String class in Java. It can be applied on the following Methods.

  1. public boolean matches(String regex) – Tells whether or not this string matches the given regular expression.
  2. public String[] split(String regex,int limit) –  Splits this string around matches of the given regular expression.
  3. public String[] split(String regex) –   Splits this string around matches of the given regular expression.
  4. replaceAll(String regex, String replacement) –    Replaces each substring of this string that matches the given regular expression with the given replacement.
  5. replaceFirst(String regex, String replacement) –  Replaces the first substring of this string that matches the given regular expression with the given replacement.
